markdownRemark.html: This range of department stores can be found in all the major cities in Spain. It can be compared with the John Lewis chains you find in the UK. You can find everything from clothes, shoes, cosmetics and accessories to homeware, books and electronics.

frontmatter.title: El Corte Inglés
